price: Abin sani kawai, dũkiyõyin sadaka na faƙĩrai ne da miskinai da mãsu aiki a kansu, da waɗanda ake lallãshin zukãtansu, kuma a cikin fansar wuyõyi, da mabarta, da a cikin hanyar Allah da ɗan hanya (matafiyi). Farilla daga Allah. Kuma Allah ne Masani, Mai hikima.
arabic: ۞ إِنَّمَا ٱلصَّدَقَٰتُ لِلۡفُقَرَآءِ وَٱلۡمَسَٰكِينِ وَٱلۡعَٰمِلِينَ عَلَيۡهَا وَٱلۡمُؤَلَّفَةِ قُلُوبُهُمۡ وَفِي ٱلرِّقَابِ وَٱلۡغَٰرِمِينَ وَفِي سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ وَٱبۡنِ ٱلسَّبِيلِۖ فَرِيضَةٗ مِّنَ ٱللَّهِۗ وَٱللَّهُ عَلِيمٌ حَكِيمٞ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.
